ygData.subject: Staff Of Writhing and Blackened Wand
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail friends... You ve all been quiet lately....must be having a lot of fun, as I am. Research has added a new element to keep me occupied....and now that I ve
ygData.messageBody:
Hail friends...

You've all been quiet lately....must be having a lot of fun, as I am.
Research has added a new element to keep me occupied....and now that I've
passed the level 16 mark (made 17 last night), Enchanting Electrum is a new
challenge as well...

But my questions are:

1. Does anyone know what the "Effect" (if any) is from the Blackened Wand?
has anyone tried Identify Item on it to see if the Effect shows up? I
obtained this recently, but the Effect area is left blank. ?

2. I'd like to be able to equip the above Wand, but that would mean a
switch from my 2H Totem to a 1H Blunt. The best I've seen is a Staff Of
Writhing. Any idea where I might obtain one? Known locations to hunt?


May Tunare bless you and the power of Polaris possess you!

Fistlebane, High Elf Enchanter, Order of Polaris Officer
